column4: can any one help me to figure why the shutdown windows is poping up over and over again?
It sounds like you're most likley experiancing a hardware error. Maybe a sticky button or something else.
If i boot with a windows 7  partition i dont have the shutdown problem, so i'm not sure about the sticky button theory
Yeah that sounds like a software issue then for sure. idk then. Sorry :(  Might be a hardware/software compatability issue
